      • onBuildLua

        public void onBuildLua(SendLua send)
        Description copied from class: Module
        Fired when building the Lua to send to a Player.

        This allows each Module to choose what to send to the Player. This means that while regular Players receive code for most functions, advanced Players may get more code to do more things.

        Overrides:
        onBuildLua in class Module
